table.name: vtiger_contactaddresses
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_contactaddresses` ( `contactaddressesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `addresstype` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `contactid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `comments` VARCHAR(512) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`contactaddressesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_contactaddressescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_contactaddressescf` ( `contactaddressesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`contactaddressesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
